email_body: The agreement is fine. I'll mail it out. "Mark Sagel" <msagel@home.com> on 11/27/2000 03:16:15 PM To: "John Arnold" <jarnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: Service Agreement John: ? Thanks again for the opportunity to provide my technical service.? Attached is an agreement that covers our arrangement.? Let me know if you have any questions.? If it's ok, please sign and fax back to me at (410)308-0441.? I look forward to working with you.? ? Mark Sagel Psytech Analytics (410)308-0245 - Agree-Enron.doc
